page.title: 15Inside the Museum building.
page.content: On the left there was a Yew hedge and on the right there were Poplar trees. Inside the castle they saw a coat of arms. They also saw different chambres of tapestries. Then they went into the garden and saw a river and ducks such as Moorhens, Coots, Tufted ducks and Drakes. They went all over the place until 2:45 p.m. The part which interested me most was when they went into the place which had a lot of things about boats and fishing. They saw a map of Wales that showed all the Welsh rivers; Usk, Taff, Ely, etc. They saw model boats which were used in olden days. They saw pictures of men in boats, and one man was carrying a boat on his back along the shore. Another thing that interested me was when they went into the school. A man was ringing a bell which was very much like a Church bell, but was smaller.
